name: Santa demo
description: Demonstrate some of the santa functionalities and the integration with Zentral.

block-yes.name: Block /usr/bin/yes (binary rule)
block-yes.description: Block the /usr/bin/yes binary on macOS 10.11 and 10.12 with a BINARY santa rule

allow-yes.name: Allow /usr/bin/yes (binary rule)
allow-yes.description: Allow the /usr/bin/yes binary on macOS 10.11 and 10.12 with a BINARY santa rule

block-transmission-cert.name: Block Transmission.app (certificate rule)
block-transmission-cert.description:
Block Transmission.app with a santa rule on the 'Digital Ignition LLC' developper certificate.

All the other applications signed with this certificate are also blocked.

allow-transmission-cert.name: Allow Transmission.app (certificate rule)
allow-transmission-cert.description:
Allow Transmission.app with a santa rule on the 'Digital Ignition LLC' developper certificate.

All the other applications signed with this certificate are also allowed.

all-allowed-events.name: All 'ALLOW_*' santa events
all-allowed-events.description: Find all the binary executions that santa allowed.

all-blocked-events.name: All 'BLOCK_*' santa events
all-blocked-events.description: Find all the binary executions that santa blocked.
